name: Ctrl + Alt + REDO!
description:
The cool thing about A.I. is that the simple concept of it is always evolving. From simple follow scripts during the 8-bit era, to full on machine learning so that they improve their skills just from watching your own playstyles, artificial intelligence is becoming more and more human every day.

I can say without a doubt that the A.I. in this game is unlike any you have seen before, and one that is impossible to win in a duel against. The reason why is a secret which we best leave close to our chest, lest the bigwigs at AAA studios try to steal it. Try our game for yourselves, and see if you can win :)

(Sponsored by Fromjaf A.I. Systems)

Programming & Writing 👨‍💻: Equilius

Art 🎨: Mr craft

Music 🎵: Falcon

This game was made for Black and White Jam #8↷∞ on Apr 12th 2022, with the restriction of making a game using only black and white colors.
